pr_title: [sensibo] Fix for dynamic channels disappearing when device goes intermittent offline

timeline.message:
Fixed truncation of debug logging when server responding with chunked content. Also removed logging of API key

Signed-off-by: Arne Seime <arne.seime@gmail.com>

Update dynamic channels whenever thing is coming online as it appears that dynamic channels are disposed when thing is reported OFFLINE

Signed-off-by: Arne Seime <arne.seime@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Can you fix the compiler warning? E.g. by storing dataToLog into a local variable.
timeline.author: fwolter

timeline.bodyText: The compiler complains about storing a reference to a method argument. To fix this, you can store dataLog to a local variable at the beginning of this method.
